Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Jar made from a coarse clay (Nile clay with a variety of organic and mineral tempers) which has been polished.  The body is ovoid and elongated. The orifice is wide, neckless and ends in a flat lip.  Throwing marks were not erased: lines remain at the base of the body and a triple spiral on the upper section.
